MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Naylor Court, Drillfield Court, Chester Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:30PM. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 00:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35PM on 22nd January 2021
